altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: ネトリヴェンジ

description.en: An introverted high school student, Souichi Sakuraba, is being bullied severely by the “Yokai” classmates. The bullying escalates, and Souichi’s childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bully’s loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by “cuckolding” them. The obscene revenge by “NTR” begins.
description.ja: 内向的な高校生・桜庭宗一は、クラスの“陽キャ”たちから激しいいじめに遭っていた。いじめはエスカレートし、宗一が唯一心を許していた幼馴染・梓が彼らの手によって汚されてしまう。絶望の底にあった宗一の前に現れたのは、悪魔・アスモデ。不思議な異能を持つ悪魔と契約した宗一は、いじめっ子の大切な人を“寝取る“ことで、自らと同じ苦しみを与えることを決意する。
description.es-la: Soichi Sakuraba, un introvertido estudiante de instituto, sufre el acoso de los abusadores de su clase. El acoso se intensifica y Azusa, la única amiga de la infancia en la que Soichi confía, es profanada por ellos. En medio de la desesperación, Soichi se enfrenta a Asmon, un demonio lascivo. Soichi hace un contrato con un demonio lascivo con poderes misteriosos, y decide infligir el mismo sufrimiento a sus verdugos "cornudando" a sus seres queridos. Comienza la lasciva venganza de "NTR"...

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)
- [Official LN (JP)](http://www.fujimishobo.co.jp/sp/201803nonbiri/)
- [Alternative Raw](https://dragonage-comic.com/product/nonbiri_noka/)
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

title.en: Yuusha Party ni Kawaii Ko ga Ita no de, Kokuhaku Shite Mita

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーにかわいい子がいたので、告白してみた。

altTitles.en: There Was a Cute Girl in the Hero's Party, so I Tried Confessing to Her

altTitles.ko: 용사 파티에 귀여운 애가 있어서, 고백해봤다

altTitles.zh: 身为魔族的我想向勇者小队的可爱女孩告白

altTitles.uk: Красуня з групи героя, якій я зізнався в коханні

description.en: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight...
description.ja: 異世界で転生したヨウキ。しかし、転生したのは勇者でも魔王でもなく、“魔王の部下”という、なんとも中途半端なポジションの魔族だった。そんなある日、勇者パーティーが魔王を倒すべく、魔王城へと攻めて来た。当然、勇者たちを迎え撃つヨウキ。ところが敵である僧侶のセシリアに一目惚れしてしまい――。
description.uk: Юкі був реінкарнованим у іншому світі. Однак, замість того щоб реінкарнувати героєм чи королем демонів, він став підлеглим короля демонів. Одного дня група героя атакувала замок короля демонів. Годі й казати, що Юкі відбив спробу героя. Однак, з першого погляду, був зачарований красою Сесиль, клерка групи героя... Супер популярна любовна комедія в іншому світі!
description.pt-br: Youki foi reencarnado em outro mundo. Entretanto, em vez de reencarnar como o herói ou o Rei Demônio, ele foi reencarnado como um subordinado do Rei Demônio. Um dia, o grupo do Herói atacou o castelo do Rei Demônio com a intenção de derrotar o Rei Demônio. É claro que Youki conseguiu repelir sua tentativa com facilidade. Apesar disso, ele acabou se apaixonando pelo sacerdotisa Cecília, à primeira vista. A fantasia super popular de comédia romântica que acontece em outro mundo!

altTitles.en: Miss Komi Is Bad at Communication.

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.ja: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。

altTitles.vi: Komi - Nữ thần sợ giao tiếp

altTitles.pt: Senhora Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.zh-hk: 古見同學有交流障礙症

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

altTitles.ja: 目つき悪い子かわいい子

altTitles.en: A Cute Girl With A Nasty Look
A Cute Girl With Nasty Look

altTitles.vi: A cute girl with nasty look

description.en:
This delinquent is stupid cute!

High schooler Tanaka-kun believes that scary girls are actually cute. Thus, sitting next to the delinquent Mizuno-san he strives to get closer to her. However, in addition to having a scary expression, she's the subject of many rumors and feared by her classmates!!

Although getting the cold shoulder at first, Tanaka's feverish offensive opens Mizuno's heart up bit by bit. But Tanaka's plan to help her fit in with their classmates during the school festival is threatened when disaster strikes!

(Translation of the Volume 1 synopsis on Amazon by KasketBox)

A twitter short by @hamita1220
description.vi: Cô gái du côn này thật là ngốc nghếch và đáng yêu! Học sinh trung học Tanaka-kun tin rằng những cô gái đáng sợ như vậy thực sự rất dễ thương. Vì vậy, ngồi cạnh Mizuno-san, một người bị coi là một kẻ du côn, cậu ấy đã cố gắng làm thân với cô ấy. Tuy nhiên, ngoài biểu cảm đáng sợ, cô ấy còn có rất nhiều tin đồn !! Mặc dù ban đầu nhận được một cái nhìn lạnh lùng, nhưng sự cố gắng của Tanaka đã mở ra trái tim của Mizuno từng chút một. Nhưng kế hoạch của Tanaka để giúp cô hòa nhập với các bạn cùng lớp trong lễ hội trường đang bị đe dọa khi thảm họa ập đến!
description.es-la:
Esta delincuente es estúpida y linda!

El estudiante Tanaka-kun cree que las chicas aterradoras son en realidad lindas. Y así, sentandose al lado de la delincuente Mizuno-san intenta hacerse más cercano a ella. Además de tener una cara aterradora, ella es el sujeto de muchos rumores y temida por sus compañeros!!

Apesar de recibir la ley del hielo al principio, la ofensiva de Tanaka abre poco a poco el corazón de Mizuno-san. Pero el plan de Tanaka para ayudarla a encajar con sus compañeros durante el festival escolar, es amenazado por un ataque sin aviso!

altTitles.fr: La vilaine vit encore une fois

altTitles.ja: 悪女は2度生きる
悪女は２度生きる

altTitles.th: ชีวิตที่สองของนางร้าย
ชีวิตครั้งใหม่ ของยัยตัวร้าย

description.de:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
description.en: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
description.fr:
Depuis son plus jeune âge, Artezia vit dans l’ombre de son frère, dont le succès suffirait à garantir le bonheur et la sécurité de la famille, selon sa mère. Elle devient donc la meilleure alliée de ce dernier, organisant maintes conspirations afin de l’aider à accéder au trône impérial. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. Un sort magique lui permet de revenir plusieurs années en arrière et de changer le cours des choses… Mais Artezia parviendra-t-elle à changer le destin, alors que l’amour s'immisce au milieu du chaos?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/villainess-lives-again-fr)
description.ja:
謀略の天才、皇帝を作り上げる！ ”お兄様が成功すれば、お前も成功するのよ” それを信じ、あらゆる悪事を企てた悪女「アルティゼア」。 しかし、彼女の兄への忠誠は裏切りとして返ってくる。 死を前にした彼女に手を差し伸べたのは宿敵であり、正義ある大公「セドリック」だけだった。 魔術で命と引き換えに18歳の自分に生まれ変わった彼女は、「セドリック」を皇帝にするために新たな人生を捧げることにするがーー

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/50796)
description.ko:
모략의 천재, 황제를 만들다!

"오빠가 잘되어야 너도 잘되는 거야."

온갖 악행을 저질러 오빠를 황제로 만들었다.
하지만 아르티제아의 헌신은 배신으로 돌아왔다.
죽음의 문턱에서 그녀에게 구원의 손을 내민 것은, 정의로운 숙적 세드릭 대공뿐이었다.

“계책을 내라.”
“…….”
“이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 인물을 나는 그대 외에는 떠올리지 못하겠어. 로산 후작.”
“…….”
“나에게는 그대의 힘이 필요하다.”

이미 기울어진 세력 판도를 뒤집고 도탄에 빠진 제국을 구할 계책은 없다.
그러나 방법은 있다.
모든 것이 잘못되기 이전으로 시간을 돌리는 것.

피의 눈물과 함께 그녀는 자신의 몸을 바쳐 고대마법으로 시간을 돌린다.
이번에는, 실패하지 않으리라.

죽지 않고 18세로 회귀한 아르티제아는 세드릭 대공을 위한 악녀가 될 것을 결심한다.

“저에게 청혼해 주십시오. 당신을 황제로 만들어 드리겠습니다.”

악마에게 무릎을 꿇은 대가로,
당신은 당신 대신 손을 더럽힐 악마를 얻을 것입니다.
description.pt: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric.Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira... de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.
description.ru:
«Твой старший брат хорош, и ты должна соответствовать.»
Она совершила множество злoдеяний, чтoбы сделать своего старшего брата Императором. Однако преданность Артезии обернулась против неё, ведь единственным, кто подал ей руку помощи на пороге смерти, был заклятый враг, эрцгерцог Седрик.
«Уловки прочь.»
«Я не знаю никого, кроме вас, кто мог бы обратить эту ситуацию вспять. Маркиза Розанна.»
«Мне нужна ваша сила.»
Казалось, тогда уже невозможно было спасти Империю, находившуюся в крайне бедственном положении, и предотвратить падение власти. Но всё же был один способ. Повернуть время вспять прежде, чем все пойдёт не так. Она, с кровавыми слезами на глазах, пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы овладеть древней магией и обернуть время вспять. В этот раз она не подведёт. Вернувшись в возраст восемнадцати лет, Артезия принимает решение не покорно умереть, а стать злодейкой и пойти на службу к эрцгерцогу Седрику.
«Пожалуйста, сделайте мне предложение. И я сделаю вас Императором.»
Дабы демoн пал ниц, нужнo запoлучить другoгo, что испачкает руки вместо вас.
description.zh:
前世为助哥哥成王做尽坏事，却反遭灭口…这一世甘为恶女，联手曾经的政治宿敌，夺回操控人生的王座！

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9146/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E9%87%8D%E7%94%9F/116)
description.pt-br: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric. Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira … de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

description.en:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.id:
Pekerjaan apa yang akan kau pilih untuk bertahan hidup saat dunia hancur oleh monster-monster yang tiba-tiba bermunculan?! Setelah memilih 'Necromancer' sebagai pekerjaannnya, Sungwoo dapat menjadikan monster yang telah ia kalahkan menjadi pengikutnya!

---

description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

---

description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

altTitles.vi: Dã ngoại nơi mặt sau của thế giới

description.en: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

altTitles.pt-br: Como A Vilã, Criar Uma Protagonista Yandere É Normal, Não É?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Shen Wei E Yi Nv Pei De Wo Yang Cheng Bìng Jiao Nv Zhu Hen Zheng Chang Ba?!

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
description.pt-br:
Jiang Yang é a diretora de designe de arte de um jogo, ao coletar referências para uma nova produção, cai de um penhasco e acaba atravessando para um mundo de cultivo. Para voltar ao seu mundo original, Jiang Yang se dedica ao cultivo e finalmente está prestes a ascender como uma divindade para retornar. No entanto, devido a uma misteriosa linha do destino, ela é forçada a ser puxada para um mundo de magia (que também é um jogo otome, e o jogo acabou de começar). Nesse novo mundo, ela encontra a protagonista do jogo, Xing Lu, sendo intimidada pela vilã secundária logo no início da academia de magia.

Jiang Yang percebe que este é o jogo problemático que a fez atravessar os mundos originalmente. Sua linha do destino está ligada a Xing Lu, a protagonista do jogo. Jiang Yang acredita que, seguindo a história do jogo até o fim, ela poderá retornar ao seu mundo real. No entanto, conforme o jogo se desenvolve, Jiang Yang relembra as tramas ridículas escritas pelo roteirista idiota do jogo. Vendo o sofrimento de Xing Lu, a fortemente responsável e moralmente íntegra Jiang Yang decide ajudar Xing Lu. Ela não apenas ajuda a livrar Xing Lu dos pretendentes indesejados, incluindo o príncipe mulherengo, mas também lhe ensina técnicas de cultivo para que ela possa se defender dos outros estudantes. Às vezes, isso até envolve sacrificar-se fisicamente! 

À medida que Jiang Yang e Xing Lu se tornam mais próximas, Jiang Yang descobre que sua linha do destino com Xing Lu é mais complexa do que ela imaginava...

altTitles.ja: 罪と快

description.en:
Under immense pressure to achieve academically both at school and at home, Minedera Zen turns to taking upskirt photos of girls as a form of escape from his life. One day, while doing his usual rounds, Zen is caught by the subject of his upskirt at the time, Houjou Ayame…

---

- Alternative Official English - [FAKKU](<https://www.fakku.net/hentai/pleasure-corruption-english>)

altTitles.ja: できそこないの姫君たち
でき姫

description.en: Fujishiro Nanaki is super cute, super popular, and super annoyed with anyone as plain as her classmate Kurokawa Kanade. When Nanaki finds out her boyfriend’s cheating on her, however, her life makes a complete 180—as does her relationship with Kanade. This all-new yuri manga series explores the budding romance between the cool girl in school and the “plain” girl she once brushed off!
description.pt-br: Nanaki-chan é a popular da escola, ela exalta sua beleza com a maior auto-estima e arrogância possível, ela é a princesinha fútil e imatura que acha que a aparência é fundamental. Mas um dia tudo isso vai por terra quando ela leva um pé na bunda gostosim do cara mais bonito e popular da escola. E pra piorar além de ser esculachada pelo zé bundão, tudo isso aconteceu na frente da mina que ela até então tirava uma onda por não ser tão vaidosa como ela… Só que dessa "tragédia" ela vai perceber que beleza nem sempre é tudo…

description.en:
"I didn’t marry my wife because I loved her. I just signed a contract with her at her request."
I actually knew the truth, so it’s not his fault. I was the one who developed false expectations. I had spent three years as his wife. and I tried hard to be the right woman for him, but I couldn’t get a piece of his heart.
"I didn’t know it would last this long. It’s annoying."
I was nothing to him to the extent that he all but forgot about me as soon as the heroine appeared. In the end, she was always going to be the main character and I was always going to be an extra. No matter how hard I try, my role isn't changing. So it’s only right for me to leave.
"I’m sorry I’ve been bothering you all this time. Please be happy with her."
description.ko: 아슬란의 아내로 지냈던 3년. 그에게 어울리는 여자가 되려고 무던히 노력했으나, 그의 마음을 얻을 수 없었다. 소설 속 여자 주인공이 나타나자마자 버려질 정도로, 나는 그에게 아무것도 아닌 존재였다. 주인공은 주인공, 엑스트라는 엑스트라. 아무리 애를 써도 나는 고작해야 귀찮은 엑스트라에 불과할 뿐. 그러니까 내가 떠나는 게 맞는 것이다.
description.tr: Siz Aşıkken ben aslında gerçeği biliyordum. “Karımla onu sevdiğim için evlenmedim.” Yani bu onun hatası değildi. Yanlış beklentilere sahip olmak benim hatamdı. “Onunla sadece ihtiyaçlara dayalı bir sözleşme imzaladım.” Karısı olarak üç yıl. Onun için doğru kadın olmak için çok uğraştım ama kalbinden bir parça alamadım. “Bu kadar uzun süreceğini bilmiyordum. Sinir bozucu.” Kadın kahraman ortaya çıkar çıkmaz bir kenara atıldığım ölçüde onun için bir hiçtim. Sonunda, ana karakter ana karakterdi ve figüran da figürandı. Ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım, ben sadece sinir bozucu bir figürandım. Rolüm değişmedi. Bu yüzden ayrılmak benim için doğru. “Bunca zaman seni rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim. Lütfen onunla mutlu ol.”

altTitles.en: The Student Body President and the Kitten

altTitles.ja: 会長さんちの子ねこ

description.en:
Because of his much-too-strict character, the excellent and capable student council president Hayami Reiichirou is often isolated from his surroundings. But things change when, one day, he is forced to take care of a kitten he received from his workaholic mother who divorced his father and left the family long ago. Seeking help from the student council's resident cat-lover, Shiraishi Kotoko, the once stern and unapproachable Reiichirou begins to…?!  
  
Also contains the story Gakuran Ouji:  
  
Kiyomi has secretly been using the prince of her school, Narumi-kun, as a model for her manga, "Gakuran Ouji."  
Why is this? Because of how elegant and perfect Gakuran looks on him, of course!! Even Narumi-kun is unaware of his use of image in Kiyomi's manga until one day, Kiyomi accidently falls and drops her drawn images infront of him..
A comic about the daily life of dungeon boys. Slaying the city, saving the dragons... or something like that.
description.pl: Komiks o codziennym życiu chłopców z lochów. Zabijanie miast, ratowanie smoków... czy jakoś tak.

altTitles.zh: 试着对即将跳下去的同班同学提议：“和我做爱吧！”

altTitles.id: Sesaat Sebelum Melompat, Aku menyarankan Teman Sekelasku, "Yuk, Ngewe!"

description.en: My first love, Koga Kurumi. Her beauty and personality, which are beyond what you'd expect from a high school student, invite jealousy, isolate her, and - she was on the verge of jumping off the roof due to bullying. So, what can I do...? "Let's have sex!" I'll scream out my love to the death and make a place for you in this world!
description.id: Dialah cinta pertamaku, Koga Kurumi. Kecantikan dan kepribadiannya di luar ekspektasi dari seorang murid SMA, membuat keirian, pengucilan,dan membuatnya hampir melompat dari atap sekolah karena perundungan. Lantas, apa yang bisa kulakukan? "Yuk, ngewe!". Akan kuteriakkan cintaku padamu hingga akhir nyawa dan membuatkanmu tempat di dunia ini!
description.ja: 俺の初恋相手、古賀胡桃。 高校生離れした美貌と性格は嫉妬を招き、孤立させ、そして――彼女はイジメを苦に屋上から飛び降りる寸前だった。 だから、俺にできることは――。 「俺とS●Xしよう!」 「…………へ、変態っ……(ドン引き)」 「そうかもな! だがいいのか? ここで死んだら君の最期の光景は“よく知らん変態の告白シーン”だ! ムードぶち壊しだな!」 「…………な、なんてことしてくれたのよ! へんたいへんたい変態っ!」 「理由はある。そう、君を世界で一番愛しているからだ! 結婚しよう!!!」 「え、えぇ~~~…………???」 死ぬ気で愛を叫びまくって、この世界に君の居場所を作ってみせる!

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"

description.de: Jin Hyuk ist Streamer und der einzige, der das Ende des Virtual-Reality-Spiels „Turm der Prüfungen“ erlebt hat. Da das Spiel jedoch immer mehr an Beliebtheit verliert, wird auch seine Streamer-Karriere immer hoffnungsloser. Doch eines Tages wird „Turm der Prüfungen" plötzlich zur Realität und die Welt steht vor dem Abgrund. Jin Hyuk, der sich im Spiel besser auskennt als jeder andere, wird zwangsläufig zur letzten Hoffnung der Menschheit!
description.en:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"It’s time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"
description.fr: Le jeu de réalité virtuelle "La Tour de l'Épreuve" est officiellement démodé et le streamer Jinhyuk est le seul à être resté jusqu'au bout pour terminer le jeu. Quand un jour "La Tour de l'Épreuve" devient réalité, Jinhyuk qui connaît les éléments du jeu mieux que personne aura forcément un grand avantage sur les autres !
description.id: Jinhyuk, satu-satunya pemain game [MENARA UJIAN] yang menyelesaikan sampai akhir meski popularitas game telah menurun. Hingga suatu hari [MENARA UJIAN] menjadi kenyataan, Jinhyuk harus menyelesaikannya dengan segala elemen yang ia ketahui tentang game ini!
description.ja: ゲーム実況ストリーマーとして活動している主人公・鈴木裕人（すずきひろと）。彼は、万人があきらめたクソゲー『試練の塔』を挑戦しクリアした唯一のプレイヤーであった。念願のエンディングを見ることができたものの、もう誰も興味をもたないこのゲームはサービス終了が確実視されていた…。11年もかけクソゲーをクリアした裕人はこれを機に現実と向き合い、ゲーム実況者としての生活を終わらせることを決心した—。が次の日、現実世界に異変が起きる。街中に突如現れた不吉な塔、そして人類に課される生死をかけた試練。それはまさに裕人が11年の月日を費やしクリアした『試練の塔』そのものであった。塔の攻略法を把握している裕人はその経験を活かし、誰よりも強い最強のビギナーとしてあらたな試練に挑む！
description.ko:
게임 너튜버로 활동 중인 주인공 진혁은 유일하게
[시련의 탑]의 엔딩을 봤지만, 게임의 인기가 하락하며
더 이상 게임 너튜버로서의 삶도 유지하기 힘들어진다.

엔딩을 보았기에 이대로 게임을 마무리하려는 진혁.
바로 그날, [시련의 탑]은 현실이 되었다.
게임의 모든 요소를 다 알고 있는 진혁은
누구보다 빠르게 모든 것을 차지한다!

"진짜 고인물이 뭔지 보여주지."
description.ru:
Главный герой Джин Хек – игрок и стример, единственный, кто прошёл до конца «Башню испытаний».
Когда он увидел концовку игры, захотел бросить её. Но в тот же день «Башня испытания» стала реальностью. И главному герою не осталось ничего, кроме как показать, на что способен тот, кто знает все нюансы игры.

«Я покажу вам, что такое настоящий задрот!»
description.th: "จินฮยอก" สตรีมเมอร์หนุ่ม ผู้หลงใหลในการเล่นเกม ใช้เวลากว่า 11 ปี ในการบรรลุชั้นบนสุดของ '[หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] เกมแฟนตาซีเสมือนจริง' พอบรรลุเป้าหมายแล้ว จึงเกิดความคิดที่อยากจะล้มเลิกการเล่นเกม และการทำสตรีมมิ่ง แต่จู่ๆ วันหนึ่งเขาก็ตื่นมาพบว่า [หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] โผล่ขึ้นมาในชีวิตจริงซะอย่างนั้น!?
description.zh:
当游戏变为现实！
无名主播竟是唯一通关者！
男主镇赫是一名游戏主播，也是唯一一位“试炼之塔”游戏的通关玩家。随着“试炼之塔”这款游戏的热度下降，游戏主播的工作渐渐无法维持镇赫的生活。通关后的镇赫本想就此退游，然而游戏竟成为了现实。如果失败世界就会灭亡！对游戏了如指掌的镇赫还能在现实世界中通关吗？
description.pt-br: Jinhyuk, um viciado completo, foi o único a ter visto o final da [Torre dos Testes], mas à medida que a popularidade do jogo diminui, fica difícil manter a vida com o jogo. Jinhyuk quer terminar o jogo assim porque ele viu o final. Naquele mesmo dia, a [Torre dos Testes] se tornou uma realidade. Jinhyuk, que conhece todos os elementos do jogo, controla tudo mais rápido do que qualquer um! “Vou te mostrar o que é um profissional de verdade.”
description.zh-hk: 活躍於遊戲NewTube頻道的主角——振赫，他是唯一看過[試煉之塔]的結局，因為該款遊戲的人氣大跌，要經營NewTube頻道再也難以維持生計。 看完遊戲的結局後，原本振赫預計要結束不再玩遊戲。但就在當天，[試煉之塔]竟成為了現實。了解遊戲所有關卡的振赫，比誰都還要快占據所有物品。 「讓你見識什麼是真正的開掛高手。」

altTitles.ja: ダンシングベイビーかりん

description.en:
Karin is a student of an institute that's very strict, but then leaves class to be dedicated to street dance in a club called "Free Square," that is in fact, one of the best. One day while dancing with her friends a group of boys who play basketball arrive and Karin falls in love at first sight with their leader, Yuuma Seta. Some thugs want to be in the club and Yuuma challenges them to a game of basketball, but the thugs are cheating...
___
Included one-shots:
* Volume 1: Pop'n Eight Beat
* Volume 2:
  * Bokura no Kokoro
  * Hug!: Haruka has a dog... A dog she ABSOLUTELY loves! Every single day, she gives him hugs and kisses~! Upon entering high school, she suddenly meets a boy... with the same name as her dog... looks like her dog... and acts like her dog in every way possible! Can Haruka resist the temptation of wanting to hug and kiss him like she does to her dog?
description.ja: バスケやダンス好きが集まる広場「フリースクエア」に通うかりんはダンスが得意な16歳で、バスケチーム「ブレイズ」の佑磨くんラブ。ある日、試合でケガをしたメンバーに代わり、かりんがバスケに初挑戦…!?

altTitles.ja: バガボンド

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en:
Would you sacrifice your honor to marry a Duke?

In order to save her family from ruin, Chloe Verdier must find a groom for her sister, Alice. 

She soon runs into the handsome but arrogant Duke Thisse who makes a proposal that could save them.

When Alice flees with a mysterious man, Chloe must seek out the Duke in the biggest gamble of her life.

description.en: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

description.en: The world is on the brink of collapse due to the zombie threat. Meanwhile, I’m living the most thrilling and tantalizing days of my life! A high school boy who loves shogi and gaming discovers a mysterious power he possesses for the first time in this zombie-infested world.
description.ja: 世界は今、ゾンビの脅威で滅びかけている。俺は今、サイコーにエチエチな日々を過ごしている――。将棋とゲームが大好きなオタクな男子高校生が、ゾンビの世界になって初めて自分が持つ”ある力”を知った。

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaige ga nai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

description.en:
Born into a family of saints, Philia’s childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome!

Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!
description.ja: “聖女”を代々輩出する家系に生まれたフィリアは、幼少からのスパルタ教育により「歴代最高の聖女」と評される程の実力を身につけ、完璧に仕事をこなしていた。だが、あまりの隙のなさに「完璧すぎて可愛げがない」と腫れ物のように扱われ、婚約者の第二王子ユリウスからも婚約破棄をされてしまう――。さらに“聖女”が不在のため苦しむ隣国との取引でフィリアは、莫大な金を対価に売られることに。隣国での悲惨な扱いを覚悟するフィリアだったが、待っていたのは予想外の大歓迎で……!?
description.pt-br: A família de Philia vem produzindo santos por gerações. Não é nenhuma surpresa que ela seja conhecida como a maior santa de todos os tempos e esteja prestes a se casar com o segundo príncipe, Julius. O que ninguém espera é que Julius cancele o noivado, alegando que a perfeição de Philia a torna sem charme e antipática. Para piorar a situação, Philia é enviada para um país vizinho em troca de ouro e recursos, forçando-a a deixar sua terra natal! Apesar de se preparar para maus-tratos, Philia encontra uma recepção calorosa em sua nova cidade, onde ela faz bom uso de suas habilidades santas, erguendo barreiras contra monstros e curando epidemias. Mas enquanto ela floresce em sua nova vida, sua terra natal está sob ameaça de destruição!

title.en: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I Don't Want to Raise a Child With You Anymore

altTitles.zh: 闭嘴恶龙我不想再跟你带孩子了

altTitles.en: Shut Up, Malevolent Dragon! I Don’t Want to Have Any More Children With You

altTitles.uk: Помовч, зла драконихо! Я не буду виховувати з тобою дітей!

altTitles.zh-ro: Bizui Elong Wo Bu Xiang Zai Gen Ni Dai Haizi Le

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...
description.uk:
Після поразки та полону, вбивця драконів Леон потрапив у полон до королеви клану Срібних Драконів. Усвідомлюючи наближення смерті, він використав заборонену техніку, щоб накласти прокляття на королеву, але несподівано королева втратила контроль.

Він думав, що це змусить королеву жити з соромом до кінця життя, і це буде гідно титулу вбивці драконів.

Але через два роки, коли Леон розплющив очі, поруч з ним сиділа дівчинка-дракон із хвостиком...

title.en: I Am the Youngest Daughter of Murim’s Strongest, the Namgung Clan

altTitles.en: Youngest Daughter of the Ultimate Martial Master Namgung Family

description.en:
"B-baa, baaah?! (Did I become a baby?! What about my revenge?!)
Everyone in the Namgung family despised me. My life was one where even my siblings turned their backs on me.
But at the moment when the family was annihilated, the choice my siblings made… was not the family, but me.

‘I never once thought of you as anything but family.’
‘Live. Even if it’s disgraceful and filthy, live, Ahee.’

Why did they save me?
A question I held in my heart my entire life as I carried out my revenge.
I thought I could finally close my eyes at the end of it all.

‘Baaah?’

I’ve returned to the past!
Could this be some black magic from the Blood Cult?
My… my revenge? My peaceful rest?!
And why are the Namgung siblings clinging to me again?!

What on earth is going on?!"

title.en: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活　第五章　水の都と英雄の詩

altTitles.ja-ro: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai-5 Shou - Mizu no Machi to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero — Começando uma Vida em Outro Mundo — Arco 5: A Metrópole da Água e o Poema do Herói

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

altTitles.es-la: Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe.

description.en:
The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.

Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella, the city of the watergates.
description.ja:
悪意が蠢く水門都市へ、集え歴戦の英雄たち。

『聖域』での戦いから一年、平穏な日々を送るナツキ・スバルだったが、王選候補者の一人、アナスタシアの招待により、一行は水門都市プリステラへと出発した。水の都で懐かしい面々と旧交を温めるスバル達。しかし、その裏では悪意が蠢いていて――。
description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

title.en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~Futari No Jikan, Iiwake No Gozen'en~

altTitles.ja: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円～

altTitles.en: A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week: 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together

altTitles.ko: 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~

description.en: Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai's time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi's orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school... Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
description.ja:
クラスメイトの宮城から、週に一度五千円でどんな“命令”でも聞くことになった仙台。陰キャ女子と陽キャ女子、学校では交わらない二人の関係は、密室の部屋の中で少しずつエスカレートしていく…。

『仙台さんの役目は、私の言うことを聞くことだから』

ゲームの相手から宿題の代行…、やがて宮城の肌に仙台の唇が触れて…。
description.es-la: Una vez a la semana, Miyagi paga 5.000 yenes a su compañera de clase Sendai.Los 5.000 yenes son para comprar tres horas de tiempo de Sendai, lo que da derecho a Miyagi a darle órdenes.Miyagi está en la parte baja de la casta escolar mientras que Sendai está en la alta. Las dos, que nunca se han cruzado en la escuela, pasan tiempo juntas después de clase bajo este contrato.Las órdenes de Miyagi vienen determinadas por su estado de ánimo del día, y Sendai no puede desobedecerlas.Un día después de clase... Miyagi llama a Sendai a su habitación y le da una orden que no suele dar.

altTitles.ja: 恋愛の授業

description.en: In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...?
description.ja: 20××年、少子化対策として「恋愛」が必修科目となった。男子高校生・秦野満月は奥手ゆえに落第寸前に陥り、恋愛落第生となった幼なじみ・可愛川茜と恋愛の補習を受けることに…!?
description.vi: Vào năm 20XX, Luật Giáo dục Tình yêu đã được ban hành. \"Tình yêu\" đã trở thành một chủ đề bắt buộc để đối phó với tỷ lệ sinh giảm.Tahano Mitsuki, một học sinh trung học đã từ bỏ sự lãng mạn và chăm chỉ học tập, đang trên bờ vực thất bại ở trường. Khi anh ấy tham gia một lớp học bổ sung để tránh học lại lớp, Mai Aihara, một cô gái xinh đẹp là một đứa trẻ có vấn đề, xuất hiện như là đối tác của anh ấy...? Đột nhiên, anh bắt đầu nghiên cứu tình yêu một mình với cô gái xinh đẹp trong ba C. Tiếp xúc gần, khu vực gần gũi và sau cánh cửa đóng kín! Aihara-san có bí mật gì không...? Một bộ phim hài lãng mạn học hỏi tình yêu giữa một cô gái JK xinh đẹp và một chàng trai.

description.en: There is no story to read here. (Interactive) This series contains themes regarding mental health and anxiety that may not be suitable for all readers. Viewer discretion is advised. If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, please reach out for help at [Crisis Text Line](http://crisistextline.org/).
description.ur:
یہاں پڑھنے کیلئے کوئی کہانی نہیں ہے۔ (متعامل) یہ تانتا ذہنی صحت اور اضطرابی سمات پر مشتمل ہے جو تمام قارئین کیلئے شاید مناسب نہ ہو۔ صوابدیدِ ناظرین کا مشورہ دیا جاتا ہے۔ اگر آپ یا کوئی جسے آپ جانتے ہیں جد و جہد کر رہا ہے یا بحران میں ہے، براہِ کرم مدد کرائسز ٹیکسٹ لائن پر رابطہ کریں:
(http://crisistextline.org/).

altTitles.ja: 後輩

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/100804060) (Chapter 1)

altTitles.ja: 僕のいけずな婚約者

description.en: Miyuki-san is a young lady born in Kyoto. My relationship with her cannot be described as good. Because... "You’re very good at flattery." Are those words sincere? Or just for show?
description.ja: 優しいけれどちょっぴり気弱な平凡男子・狛井空汰。文武両道で眉目秀麗、加えて京都の名家のお嬢様・稲荷坂御幸。一見不釣り合いにも見える二人は将来を約束した“許嫁”。しかし、空汰は御幸との関係に思い悩んでいた…何故なら…「えらいお世辞がお上手やわぁ」彼女の本心がわからないから＿＿！！
description.pl: Miyuki-san jest młodą kobietą urodzoną w Kyoto. Moje relacje z nią nie są dobre. Ponieważ... "Jesteś bardzo dobry w pochlebianiu". Czy te słowa są szczere? Czy tylko na pokaz? Frustrująca historia miłosna, w której nasze wzajemne uczucia wciąż mijają się z celem.

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo ha Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

title.en: I Just Want to Game in Peace

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhǐ Xiǎng Ānjìng De Dǎ Yóuxì

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Play Games Quietly
I Just Want to Play the Game Quietly

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Zhi Xiang Anjing De Da Youxi

description.en: Dimensional storms have descended and many extradimensional areas have appeared on Earth. All kinds of mysterious extradimensional lives are born in these extradimensional areas. In order to become strong, humans started to enter these dangerous areas to hunt and kill extradimensional creatures. But I, Zhou Wen, have made these extradimensional areas into instance dungeons in my mobile game. By levelling up my game character, I will be levelling up my strength in reality. When others are risking their lives, I’m here getting stronger by gaming.

altTitles.en: Creepy Cat ~ My Strange Daily Life with a Cat ~

altTitles.ja: CreepyCat 猫と私の奇妙な生活

altTitles.ms: Kucing Seram - Kehidupan seharian yang pelik bersama kucing.

altTitles.uk: Моторошний кіт - Моє дивне життя з котиком

altTitles.ro: Pisica Ciudată - Viața Mea Zilnică cu o Pisică Ciudată

altTitles.ur: ترسناک بلی ~ بساتھ ایک بلی میری عجیب زندگیِ روزمرہ ~

description.en:
Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creature—Creepy Cat!
Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate.
This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment
description.uk: Флора тільки-но переїхала до старого будинку, але тут вже живе моторошний котик. Відтоді й почалось їхнє таємниче співіснування.
description.ur: فلورا ابھی ایک پرانے گھر میں منتقل ہوئی ہے، لیکن وہاں پہلے ہی ایک ترسناک بلی رہ رہی ہے۔ تب سے ان کی پراسرار ہم آہنگی کا آغاز ہوا۔

description.en:
Rebirth is just a starting point from reaching the peak. Intruding crypt, the rise of martial arts  
  
The main character Fang Ping gets send back 10 years into a parallel world, resembling his own in everything, but the fact that martial arts is omnipresent and necessary to gain a bright future… (Note: Story plays in 2006)  
  
Will Fang Ping reach his goal? And become a mighty Martial Artist to finance his Adorable Little Sisters Empire? Or will he fall and hit his head on a block of tofu and die…?   
  
Find it out yourself, and read the manhua!
description.pt-br: O renascimento é apenas um ponto de partida para atingir o pico. Intrusão na cripta, a ascensão das artes marciais O personagem principal Fang Ping é enviado de volta 10 anos para um mundo paralelo, semelhante ao seu em tudo, mas o fato de que as artes marciais são onipresentes e necessárias para obter um futuro brilhante... Será que Fang Ping alcançará seu objetivo? meta? E se tornar um poderoso Artista Marcial para financiar seu Adorável Império das Irmãzinhas? Ou ele vai cair e bater a cabeça em um bloco de tofu e morrer…? Descubra você mesmo e leia o manhua!

altTitles.ja: 東京卍リベンジャーズ

description.en:
Takemichi is a 26-year-old unemployed virgin who learns that the girl he dated in middle school, the only girl he ever dated, has died. Then, after an accident he finds himself in a time leap back to his middle school years. He vows to change the future and save the girl, and to do that he aims to rise to the top of the Kanto region's most brutal delinquent gang.

---

**Notes:**
- The original Japanese title contains the manji symbol, so it will not be removed from the title on MangaDex.
- Addendum on the "Manji" for those uninformed. From Seven Seas' Omnibus Edition:
  *"In East Asia the manji (卍) is an ancient religious symbol of power and good fortune for many different countries and religions around the world, including Buddhism, Hinduism, Jainism, and a number of Indo-European and Native American religions as well."* 
*"The specific meaning of the symbol varies by nation and religion, and also by the position of the "arms" of the cross--whether they face left or right, or whether the cross is tilted or straight."* 
*"In the 1930s, the swastika symbol--a clockwise, tilted cross--was adopted by the Nazi Political Party in Germany, and gained a negative reputation as a symbol of hatred in the modern world."*
*"The manji used by the Tokyo Manji Gang as their emblem is intended to be the ancient Buddhist symbol, as evidenced by the appearance of its counterclockwise, straight arms..."*

---

**Links:**
- [Official English Translation (Seven Seas)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/tokyo-revengers-omnibus)
- [Official English Translation (Kodansha USA)](https://kodansha.us/series/tokyo-revengers)
description.tl: Si Takemichi ay isang 26-taong-gulang na walang trabahong birhen na nalaman na ang babaeng naka-date niya sa middle school, ang tanging babaeng naka-date niya, ay namatay. Pagkatapos, pagkatapos ng isang aksidente nahanap niya ang kanyang sarili sa isang paglukso ng oras pabalik sa kanyang mga taon sa middle school. Nangako siyang babaguhin ang kinabukasan at iligtas ang babae, at para magawa iyon, layunin niyang umangat sa pinaka-brutal na delingkwenteng gang sa rehiyon ng Kanto.
description.tr:
Takemichi, ortaokulda çıktığı, şimdiye kadar çıktığı tek kızın öldüğünü öğrenen işsiz bir bakirdir. Daha sonra bir kazanın ardından kendini ortaokul yıllarına geri dönen bir zamanda bulur. Geleceği değiştirmeye ve kızı kurtarmaya yemin eder ve bunu yapmak için Kantou bölgesinin en acımasız suçlu çetesinin tepesine çıkmayı hedefler.

2020 yılında en iyi shounen dalında 44. Kodansha Manga Ödülü'nü kazanmıştır.
description.pt-br: Takemichi é um virgem desempregado de 26 anos que descobre que a garota que ele namorou durante o ensino médio - a única que ele já namorou - morreu. Então, após um acidente ele se encontra de volta ao passado, durante seus anos de ensino médio. Ele promete mudar o futuro e salvar a garota, e para isso, ele planeja subir até o topo da gangue de delinquentes mais brutal da região de Kantou.
